results.title: The Correlation between Two Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibitor's Concentrations and Cognition
results.journal: Int J Environ Res Public Health
results.text_hl: ...Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ are angiotensin-converting enzyme (@GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE@@@) drugs and widely used in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis
results.text_hl: His past medical history was significant for essential @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ being treated with oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 20 mg daily.

results.title: Effects of Candesartan vs Lisinopril on Neurocognitive Function in Older Adults With Executive Mild Cognitive Impairment
results.text_hl: In this randomized clinical trial of 176 adults with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, 12-month treatment with @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ was associated with improvement in executive function and episodic memory compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

results.title: A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis
results.text_hl: Here, we present a case of a 63-year-old man with a history of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ who was being treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ for eight months and developed a fatal case of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-induced severe @DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Acute_Necrotizing @DISEASE_MESH:D019283 @@@necrotizing pancreatitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Masarweh OM, Al-Moussally F, Meruvia Garron JP, Kunadia A, Karasik O, Asmar A. A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis Cureus. 2023 Jun;15(6):e40071. PMID: 37304386
